title: Executive Order 6079-Designation of Mbs. Helen V. McLeod to Sign Land Patents
content: Mrs. Helen V. McLeod, of the General Land Office, Department of the Interior, is hereby designated to sign land patents during the absence of the clerk regularly designated for that purpose.
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 6079-Designation of Mbs. Helen V. McLeod to Sign Land Patents Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/361913
